chart_description: The System Clock Status chart shows the status of the system clock synchronization with a reference clock. The chart provides insight into the accuracy and reliability of the system clock, which can impact other system functions and applications.

dimension_descriptions.clockerr: The clock error dimension displays the difference between the system clock and the reference clock, in seconds. A high value can indicate an issue with clock synchronization.
dimension_descriptions.unsync: The unsynchronized dimension shows the percentage of time the system clock is not synchronized with the reference clock. A value greater than 0 indicates an issue with clock synchronization.
